mapper.insert: insert into exam (subjectCode, examName, studentCnt, startTime, endTime) values (#{subjectCode}, #{examName}, #{studentCnt}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.delete: delete from exam where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName}
mapper.update: update exam set startTime=#{startTime}, endTime=#{endTime} where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName = #{examName}
mapper.select: select subjectCode, examName, startTime, endTime from exam where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} order by startTime
